subject: Regarding your Alemeno trial
body_text:
Dear Parent,Thank you for your interest in the Alemeno to inculcate healthy eating habits in your child.  We are giving finishing touches to our solution; it should be available soon.
We are a team of professionals guided by pediatricians and child psychologists. We have helped hundreds of parents inculcate healthy eating habits in their kids. We are on a mission to create a generation of healthy kids.
If you would like a FREE consultation call from our team with regard eating habits of your kids, please fill up this the form http://www.alemeno.com/general/survey{}. Please ignore if already filled.

Thanks
Team Alemeno.
body_html:
Dear Parent,

Thank you for your interest in the Alemeno to inculcate healthy eating habits in your child.

We are giving finishing touches to our solution; it should be available soon.

We are a team of professionals guided by pediatricians and child psychologists. We have helped hundreds of parents inculcate healthy eating habits in their kids. We are on a mission to create a generation of healthy kids.

If you would like a FREE consultation call from our team with regard to eating habits of your kids, please fill up this the form. Please ignore if already filled.

Thanks

Team Alemeno
